aboutThisUseCase.name: Setup Side-by-Side UI Extensions for SAP S/4HANA on SAP BTP
aboutThisUseCase.description: Create a custom UI application on SAP BTP which consumes data from SAP S/4HANA
aboutThisUseCase.author: sangeetha.jayakumar@sap.com

executeAfterAccountSetup.description: We have now created a subaccount in SAP BTP. Continue manual steps according to Github documentation
executeAfterAccountSetup.command: echo 'Continue next steps as shown in the Github: https://github.com/SAP-samples/cloud-extension-html5-sample/blob/mission/mission/README.md'
